title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 143.9 - Review of shift pay differentials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 143.9 - Review of shift pay differentials

State Regulations

The Director of Classification and Compensation may, at his
discretion, review existing shift pay differentials with reference to need or
appropriateness and make such changes as may be warranted, subject to the
approval of the Director of the Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
143.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
